puzzles.description: White to play. Find the tactical sequence to win material.
puzzles.hint: Look for a knight fork followed by a rook invasion

puzzles.description: Black to play. Find the tactical sequence to gain a decisive advantage.
White to play. Find the tactical shot that leads to a winning position.
puzzles.hint: The dark squares around black's king are weak

puzzles.description: Black to play. Find the winning combination.
puzzles.hint: The white king is exposed on the back rank

puzzles.description: White to play. Find the winning sequence.
puzzles.hint: Control of the c-file is crucial

puzzles.description: Black to play. Find the mate in 2.
puzzles.hint: Look for a defensive king move followed by a queen mate

puzzles.description: White to play. Find the winning combination with a fork.
puzzles.hint: The rook can be attracted to create a tactical opportunity

puzzles.description: White to play. Find the tactical sequence to gain advantage.
puzzles.hint: The rook move creates multiple threats

puzzles.description: Black to play. Find the discovered attack.
puzzles.hint: The king move unveils a powerful attack
